Field.Name: BaseUnitOfMeasureCode
Field.Description:
Specify the code of a unit of measure as defined in the metadata.
This data should be sent in the `PropertyValue` file instead. Contact us for more information regarding this change.
If you are currently not sending any data in this field, you can safely remove it.

Field.Name: SizeCode
Field.Description:
Specify the code of a size as defined in the metadata. I.e. sizes of a t-shirt: `XS`, `S`, `M`, `L`, `XL`.
Alternatively, a size can be specified as a measurement with a decimal value and a unit of measure.

Field.Name: Size
Field.Description:
This data should be sent in the `PropertyValue` file instead. Contact us for more information regarding this change.
If you are currently not sending any data in this field, you can safely remove it.

Field.Name: SizeUnitOfMeasureCode
Field.Description:
This data should be sent in the `PropertyValue` file instead. Contact us for more information regarding this change.
If you are currently not sending any data in this field, you can safely remove it.

Field.Name: ColorCode
Field.Description: Specify the code of a color as defined in the metadata.

Field.Name: EAN
Field.Description: The EAN-13 barcode digits. An EAN-13 barcode (originally European Article Number, but now renamed International Article Number even though the abbreviation EAN has been retained) is a 13 digit (12 data and 1 check) barcoding standard.

Field.Name: LeadTimeCalculation
Field.Description: The average delivery time in days for the main vendor for this product.

Field.Name: GrossWeight
Field.Description:
This data should be sent in the `PropertyValue` file instead. Contact us for more information regarding this change.
If you are currently not sending any data in this field, you can safely remove it.

Field.Name: GrossWeightUnitOfMeasureCode
Field.Description: Specify the code of a unit of measure as defined in the metadata.

This data should be sent in the `PropertyValue` file instead. Contact us for more information regarding this change.
If you are currently not sending any data in this field, you can safely remove it.

Field.Name: NetWeight
Field.Description:
This data should be sent in the `PropertyValue` file instead. Contact us for more information regarding this change.
If you are currently not sending any data in this field, you can safely remove it.

This data should be sent in the `PropertyValue` file instead. Contact us for more information regarding this change.
If you are currently not sending any data in this field, you can safely remove it.

Field.Name: UnitVolume
Field.Description:
This data should be sent in the `PropertyValue` file instead. Contact us for more information regarding this change.
If you are currently not sending any data in this field, you can safely remove it.

Field.Name: UnitVolumeUnitOfMeasureCode
Field.Description: Specify the code of a unit of measure as defined in the metadata.

This data should be sent in the `PropertyValue` file instead. Contact us for more information regarding this change.
If you are currently not sending any data in this field, you can safely remove it.

Field.Name: Durability
Field.Description: Contains the format of an xsd duration type without the time part (max = 100 years). Fex 'P0Y3M20D' = 3 months, 20 days.

Field.Name: TariffNo
Field.Description: Intrastat code of the product. Intrastat is the system for collecting information and producing statistics on the trade in goods between countries of the European Union (EU).

Field.Name: CountryPurchased_ISO
Field.Description: The two-letter ALPHA-2 ISO 3166 notation of the country code. More info at [www.iso.org](https://www.iso.org/iso-3166-country-codes.html).

Field.Name: CountryOrigine_ISO
Field.Description: The two-letter ALPHA-2 ISO 3166 notation of the country code. More info at [www.iso.org](https://www.iso.org/iso-3166-country-codes.html).

Field.Name: SalesUnitofMeasureCode
Field.Description:
This data should be sent in the `PropertyValue` file instead. Contact us for more information regarding this change.
If you are currently not sending any data in this field, you can safely remove it.

Field.Name: PromoTypeID
Field.Description:
Specify the ID of a promotion type as defined in the metadata.
Values supported by NatchOS: - `1` = promotion - `2` = liquidation - `3` = spotlight - `4` = bestseller - `5` = new product
Custom types should have a value greater than 100.

Field.Name: Product_TransportCost
Field.Description: The transport cost for this product.
